div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem quarto die mensis Augusti anno quo Supra

Eodem die Johannes Cullane Alexander rede thomas Waus
Robertus crag Willelmus futhes Willelmus Wormet Andreas
lousone Richardus hill Willelmus Kintor / thomas chapman
Walterus strathachin Willelmus Watsone et Johannes cruk
schank burgenses dicti bugi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Johannes
glenmaluyn auus Roberti glenmaluyn latoris presencium obiit
vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
dominj nostri Regis de quadam terra sine tenemento tam anteriore
quam Interiore Cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vir castri ex in orientali fronte eiusdem vici inter
terram heredum quondam Willelmi Adesone ex australi
ex vna et terram Johnanis retre ex boreali partibus ab altera
Et quod dictus Robertus est legittimis et propinquior heres
dicti quondam Johannis auj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc oer annum
xxvj s' et viij d' et valuit xx s' tempore pacis Et quod
tenetur in Capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per
seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus dominj nostri Regis
per Spacium trium annorum aut eocirca In defectu verj heredis
Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis datum et clausum sub
Sigillo dictj balliuj ac Sigillis quorundam qui huic Inquisicionj intererant faciendum
Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

Be It kende tile ale mene be thes present lettres ws Aldermane bailyeis counsale
ande communite of aberdene' our awaile in that part sene considerande vndirstandin to haue
Set and to ferme lattin ande be thir present lettres settis ande to ferme letttis for maile lattis tile oure
trest nichbouris margaret Kintor the Relict' of vmquhill Williame chamer ale ande haile oure
fischingis of ane thridepart of ane nethe' one the wattire of Done for ale the termes of
thritein' yeris for ane' certane Some vsuale money of scotlande pait tile ws in nov
merit money in tyme of the makin of thir lettres to the furnisinge of the expensis ande costis
of certane honorabill of oure nichtbouris passande to the fest of oure Souerance lordis
mariage' at commavnde of his hous eftire the tenor of his lettres directit tile ws tharupone'
to the plesour of his gude grace ande for commone proffit of the toun' The quhilkis
Some' of money is full ande haile pament of the saide thrittene' yeris formaile
ande gressome' we halde ws weill content ande fullely pait ande dischargis
ande quietclamys the saide margaret hire ayris executoris and assignez' tharof ffor
ws oure successoris ayris executoris ande assignais now ande foreuire To he be haldin
ande hed ale ande haile the said thridpart of nethis fisching' witht thare perti /
nentis to the saide margaret tharof for ws oure successoris ayres executoris ande assignez'
nowe ande foreuire To be haldin ande hede ale ande haile the saide part Thridpart
of nethtis fischingis witht thare pertinence to the saide margaret hire ayres ande
assignez' Induellaris of the said burghe' witht ale ande sindrie fredomis commo /
diteis asiamentis and proffitis pertening or may pertene to The Entre of the saide
margaret hire ayris or assignez' salbe in ande witht the saide thirde part of nethis
fiscingis one the wigill of Sanct Androwe in wintir in the yer of gode ane
thousande fiwe hundreth ande sex yeris / quhilk scho has in tak of ws to
the saide wigill ande frathinfurthe to Jois' ande bruk the samyne' peciable'
quhill ale the saide thritten' yeris haile ande togiddir be fullely complet
and Runnyne but ony Interrupcione' or brek of termes or yeris Impediment
or demavnde of ws oure successoris or ony vtheris to be maide In the contrar'
Ande gif it happinnis the saide margarate hire ayres of assignez' to be Inquiet
wexit or tribulit in the Joisin of the said fischingis quharthroue scho ande
thai maij nocht peciablie' bruk thame Induringe the saide termes as god forbed'
Thane we oblis' ws ande oure Successoris lelely ande treuly to pay to the saide
margaret hir ayres or assignez' ane last of Salmonde suffcient merchande
gude of the richtuis' mesoure of Aberdene' Ilkane yer quhill thai Jois' the
saide fischingis peciable' Ande atoure ye sall wa ws to haue resauit be the
handis of the said margaret the maile of the saide thridpart of nethis' fischingis
for ale the termes of thre yeris next hereftire following in novmerit mony
to the saide costis ande expensis of the qhilkis thre yeris maile to cum we hald'
ws weill content ande fullely pait Ande dischargis ande quiet'clamys
the saide margaret hire ayres executoris ande assignez' tharof for ws and oure
Successoris to warande keipe ande defende the saide thridpart of nethis'
fischingis witht the pertinence to the saide margaret hir ayres ande assgnez'
for ale the termes of thritten' yeris as saide Is maile ande girssome free
be ale oure landis ande gudis aganys ale dedly ale fraude ande
gill avayput In witnessing of the quhilkis we haue appensit oure
commone Seill to thire lettres at Aberdene' the xxiiij day of Julij the yeir
of gode ane thousande fiwe hundreth ande thre yeris

Be It kende tile ale mene be thire present lettres ws Aldermane bailyeis counsale and
Communite of Aberdene' our availe in that part sene cosiderit ande vndirstandin to
haue Sett ande to formaile lattin ande be thire present lettres Settis ande to formaile lattis
till oure trest nichbooure Androue murray ale ande haile the sext part of oure fischingis
of the crovis one the wattire of Done for ale the termes of sextene yeris for ane certane
Some vsuale money of Scotlande pait tile vs in novmerit money in tyme of the
makin of thire lettres to the furnising of the expesnis ande costis of Certane honorable'
of oure nichtbouris passande to the fest of oure Souerane lordis mariage at commavnde
of his hines eftire the tenor of his lettres directit tile ws tharupone' to the plesoure of
his gude grace ande commoun' proffit of the toun' Of the quhilkis Some of money
in full ande haile pament of the saide sextene yeris formaile ande girssome
we halde ws weill contenit ande fullely pait Ande dischargis ande quiet'clamys
the saide Androue his ayris executoris ande assignez' tharof for ws oure Successoris
ayris executoris ande assignez' nowe ande foreuire To be haldin ande hede ale ande
haill of the saide sextpart of oure fischingis of the crovis y witht thar pertinence
to the saide Androue his ayres ande assignez' induellaris of the saide burghe' with ale
ande sindrie fredomes commodities assiamentis ande proffitis pertening of may pertene'
tharto The Entre of the saide Androue his ayres or assignais salbe in ande witht the
saide fischingis one the wigill of Sanct Androw next eftire following the dat
of thire lettres quhilkis he has in tak of ws quhill the saide wigill Ande frathin/
furthe' to continew in peciable' Josin ande bruk in the samyne' quhill ale the
termes of xvj yeris haile ande togiddir be fullely complet ande Runnyne'
but ony Interrupcioun' or brek of termes or yeris Impediment or demavnde of
ws or our successoris or ony vtheris to be maide in the contrar' Ande giff it hap
pinnis the aide Androue his ayres or assignez' to be Inquiet wexit or tribulit
in the Josin of the saide fischingis quharthroue he ande thai may nocht peciable'
bruk I thame Induring the saide termes as gode forbeide Thane we
oblis' ws ande our Successoris lelely ande treuly to pay to the saide androw
his ayres or assignez' aucht berrollis of Salmond' sufficient merchande
gude of the Richtuis' mesoure of Aberdene' Ilkane yere quhill thai Jois' the
saide fischingis peciable' Ande we the said alderman bailyes counsaile and
communite oblis' ws ande our successoris to warande kepe ande defende the saide
sext partis fischingis of the crovis with thare pertinence to the sadie androue his ayris
ande assignez' for ale the termes of sextene' yeris as saide Is maile ande girssom'
free be ale our landis ande gudis aganys ale dedely ale fraude ande
gill away put In witnessing of the quhilkis we haue appensit our common'
Sell to thir lettres at aberdene the xxiiij day of Julij the yer of gode ane thousand'
vc ande thre yeris

Vniuersis et Singulis ad quorum noticiam presentes littere perueneruit burgenses
et communitas burgi de Aberdene' Eternam in domino salutem noueritis nos auisacione
matura prohabita vtilitate nosta in hac parte vndequam preuisa et diligenter considerata
ex certis causis racionabilibus omnes nostros monen' et notant' pro sumptibus et expensis nostris
conburgensis exhibendis accessuris ad communiam sponsalium serenissimj domini nostri regis fecisse
constituisse et ordinasse nec non tenorem presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros
dilectos vicinos Alexandrum menyheis nunc prepositum nostrum Robertum blinsell alexandrum rede
Alexandrum chamer alexandrum mare Willelmum futhes et Johannem Ratre nostros dilectos comissaros
Irreuocabiles dantes et concendentes eisdem ac maiorj parti eorundem nostram plenariam potestatem
ac mandatum speciale totas et integras pischarias nostras tercie partis Rethis aque borialis
de Done' quas quonam Willelmus chamer de nobis habuit in assedacione pro of terminis tresdecim
annorum de vniuersis pischarias sexte partis de corvis quas nunc Andreas murray
de nobis tenet in assedacione pro terminis sexdecim annorum nostris conburgensis et eorum
Assedandj Immediate complendorum post introitus ad easdem pro firmis girssumis pre manibus persoluendis
in honorem excellentisme regia maiestatis et dicti burgi intrantis ad dictas piscarais tercie partis rethis
de Done' in vigilia Sancti Andree apostoli in anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo sexto Et ad piscarias
prefate sexte partis de crovis in vigilia dicti apostoli datam presencium Immediate se et generaliter
omnia alia et Singula faciendum gerendum et excercendum In premissa necessaria et oportuna
promittenti nos Ratum gratum firmum et stabilem habens et habiturum totum et quicquid dictj commissarij
nostri aut eorum maior pars nomine nostris Rite duxerunt aut duxerit faciendum In cuius rej testimonium
presentibus nostrum sigillum communione appendi se cuius apud dictum burgum xxjo die menis Julij anno
Domini millesimo quingentesimo tercio

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
Septimo die Augusti anno quo Supra

Eodem die Willelmus gordone conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid
blinsel prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis nicholsone Et Idem Johannes
conucitus per perturbio dicti Willelmj et quilibet alteri emendabit ut Jura
volunt

Eodem die Jacobus Kennertj amerciatur per dictam assisam pro perturbio Andree
lousone Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Et dictus Andrea quitus de
perturbio ipsius Jacobi

Eodem die margareta hay Sponsa gilberti tulidef conuictus fuit per
assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid blinsele prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Ri/
chardi redhede Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Et dictus Richardus
quitus de perturbio prefate margareta

Eodem die Richardus redhed' deuenit plegius legalis quod Robertus Abirdour'
erit Indepmnis pro thoma menyes aliter quam per viam Juris et Willelmus Wor
met deuenit plegius legalis quod prefatus thomas erit Indempnis pro dicto Roberto
aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios de huismodi
fideiussione
Indempnes

Eodem die Robertus athoile conuictus fuit per dictam Assisam pro perturbio
thome menyeis Et Idem thomas conucitus fuit pro perturbio dicti
Roberti et quilibet alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Willelmus rollande deuenit plegius legalis quod Robertus
athoill erit Indempnis pro thoma menyeis aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Willelmus Wormet deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus thomas erit
Indempnis pro dicto Roberto aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet obligatur
ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huismodi fideiussione

Eodem die margareta hay Sponsa gilbertj tulidef conuictus fuit per
assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid blinsel prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Curie
Et emendam eiusdem perturbij referebant preposito et Consilio

The saide day for the strubulance done be mege hay Spous' to gilbert tulidef
to richarde redhede It was fundin ordanit and deliuirit be the assis' that the saide
margaret sulde Syt done one hir' kneis in the court furthwith and ask richerde
redhede forgiwnes for the offence done to him and gif euire scho committis ony strubulance
in tym' to Cum to him his wif or seruandis or tile ony vthir and beis conuict' tharof scho
Sale pay iiijor li' of wax to the haly blud licht vnforgevin Ande eftir this
deliuerance the balye and William scrimgeor sergeand' chargit the said margaret to sit don'
one hir' kneis and ask the said' Richerd' forgivnes and fulfill the deliuerance of
the saide assis' quhilkis scho walde nocht do and thareftir at commavnde of Dauy
mar' balye the saide Williame officar' with his Wande chargit the saide margaret
to fulfil the ordinance of the saide assis' in the kingis namez' aldirman and balyeis
quhilk scho said' sche walde nocht do scho being thris' chargit and tuechit with
the said' officiaris wande of Justice bot contempnandlie dissobeit the balye
officiaris and the haill court sayande scho hed leuire se him hingit

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Octauo die
mensis Augusti anno quo Supra

The saide day It was fundin and deliuirit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
Stewinsone forspekar that William of gordone hede done wrange that
ye seruit nocht Robert crag his mastir in his bait with Johne nicholson'
hed botisman and mastir of the samyn for the quhilk he was in Ane
amerciment of the court and tile Amend' the skath done tharintill and to serue his
said' mastir to michaelmes nixt to Cum et cetera and the saide Johne in
the saide boit as efferis

The saide day It was deliuerit be the saide assis' Jonhne Stevinsone
forspeakar that Williame gordone hed' wrangit becaus' he walde nocht
schuyt his lyne quhen the hede botisman of the boit chargit herfor
the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciment of the court et cetera

Eodem die patricius rede deuenit plegius legalis quod Willelmus gordone erit
Indempnis pro Johanne nicholsone aliter quam per viam Juris Et Robertus
crag deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro dicto Willelmo
aliterquam per viam Juris Et quibus obligatur ad releuandum suos plegios et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xviij die Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day comperit James Abirdour' attachit be Androu nachtj
officiar' and warnit tile ansuer tile ane borghe' fundin on'
him be Alexander burnat for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
him of xx s' iiij s' iiijor d' Offerit him redy furthtwith tile ansuer to
the said' borghe' and the saide alexander oftymes callit to follow
his said' borghe' and nocht Comperit the saide James protestit for
his costis skathis and expensis Ande that he ansuer' nocht quhill
be be pait tharof and follouit with new Soit

The saide day thome Walcar' in his wiffis nayme grantit the
Intrometing with ane pece of linnyne clatht of Alexander Kingis
Ande askit xx dais that he mycht serche and Seik gif he mycht
comprehend' the saide clath / Ande gif he coud' nocht get it he
oblist him be his hande and fatht of his bodie to pay the
price of the saide clatht samekile' as the man that weuyf
it and vthiris iij or' iiijor personis vnsuspectit to the saide Alexander ordanit him

The said'day Anrow nachtj come Souerte for thome Walcar
in murthill to ples' Alexander hay for thre Salmonde aucht to him
to morne befor Alexander Rede and balye be the fath of his bodie and the
said' thomas Oblist him to freithe the saide Androw

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxv die mensis Augusti anno quo Supra

Eodem die Andreas Jonhesone conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore
Johannis leslie prelocutoris eiusdem per perturbio de Roberti coutis Et Idem
Robertus conuictus per perturbio dicti Andree et quilibet alteri emendabit
ut Jura volunt

The saide day the balyeis Assignit the law day next eftir
michaelmes Immediate follouing to sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht
tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be James hill
for the wranguis' occupacioun' of ane croft of his but asse
dacioun' of him Ande discernit the copy of the saide borghe'
to the said' knicht

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxviij die mensis Augusti anno quo Supra

The said' day Jonhne Andirsone lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit
to follow the borghe' fundin be him one William gallouay was
in ane americament of the court et cetera Ande the said' William offerit him
reddy tile ansuer' to the saide borghe and protestit for his costis skathis
ande expensis or' euire he be herd' In Jugement and' maide
Constitut and ordanit patry Rede his procurator tile ansuer to the
said' Johne et cetera promittand' tile halde ferme and Stabill with ale
vthir claus' necessar and oportone

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abidene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
primo die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday that
next Cumis to Jonhne Wormet ande Johne of mar' to cum
befor thame and ansuer tile vthiris Anent the brekin of the
Statutis of the gilde allegit be the saide Johne mar' brokin
one him be the saide Johne Wormet

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday eftir the law day
the gilde Court to Jonhne of murray tile ansuer to the borghe'
fundin one him be Jonhne leslie of Warderis for the wrang
wis' outakin' of ane kyst with Silkis out of his hous'
extending to iijC markis Ande the Copy of the saide borghe
was deliuirit to the saide Johne' of murray

add.foreign: Annande procurator Johannis Robertson' et chernside

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman and ballieis ordanit and chargit
Androw nachtj to pas' ande tak Jonhne Cuk with him
and mak penny of the penny worthtis deliuirit be the
wif of patry chernside to the pament of the Somez'
aving to Jonhne Annande procurator to Johne Robertson'

The saide day Androw Cullane lauchfullie callit tile
entir' peir' Duchman attachit at the Instande of
Williame Walcar' was in ane Amerciament of the court for
his vntreis' of the saide per' et cetera

The saide day Androw nachtj officiar' and Donalde baxtar deponit be
thar' aithis that Alexander nory was skatht in his yerd tene
schillingis of his Caill

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
sexto die mensis augusti Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne buk was conuict' be ane suorn assis'
patry rede forspekar for trubulance of sere Jonhne' ruthirfurde
in worde for the quhilkis the saide Johne buk was in ane
amerciament of the covrt and Amende as law wile and forber' in tyme
to Cum

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurde was fundin quyt of the
wranguis' taking' of ane Cow fra Jonhne buk be ane suorne
assis' patry Rede forspekar

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem xjo die Septembris Anno quo supra

add.foreign: Alexander Rede Soluit firmam piscatorie sue Alexandro gray

div.p:
The saide day Alexander gray mastir of the kirk werk
for the tyme grantit him resauit be the handis of
Alexander Rede aucht pundis vsuale money scotland'
for his half nethis fischingis of Done of the termes of
mertimes and witsonday last bigane Ande atour the saide
Alexander Rede Offerit him redy gif ony mastir of werk walde
allege and Schew that he war' aving ony part of his wattir
of maile to pay It furthtwith but delay of ony yeris or termes
bigane

The said' day Williame Scot burges of montros' offerit him
redy to deliuir ro Johne broys' michaele baldavy Walter
chamer michaele Suentone and vthiris merchandis of montros'
thai deliuering and paing' him his fraucht Ande gif thai walde
nocht he walde hous' thar' gudis one thar expensis Ande forthir
he protestit for his Costis Skaththis and expensis that he happinnis
to Sustene tharthrow

The saide day Androu logy quhit fischear' schew that he was
warnit to this day to ansuer' at the Instance of thomas
howy quhilk comperit nocht to follou tharfor he protestit for his
costis and expensis or euire the saide thomas be herde

The saide day Johne meldrum grantit him Souerte to Androw
fergousone for ane hors' and the hyer' of him hirit to Robert
Dunwyne Inglismane'

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
Cullane forspekar that James Colisone Is quyt of the wranguis'
haldin of tua barrellis Salmonde fra Dauy mar' and aw nocht
to pay quhill the last yeris that he fischis the saide dadis wattir

The said' day the aldirman ballieis offerit thame reddy to minister Justice
equaly as efferis to the merchandis of montros' in the debatis betuix
thame one that ane part Ande Williame Scot one that vthir part

Eodem die Duncanus Colisone deuenit plegius legalis quod Andreas
murray erit Indempnis pro Johanne Colisone aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Alexander Rede deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro
dicto Andrea aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur
ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huismodi fideiussione per manus
suas

head.add: plegij legales inter mercatores de montros'

div.p:
Eodem die michael de baldevy deuenit plegius legalis quos Willelmus scot erit Indempnis
pro thoma Scot patre suo aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictus thomas deuenit plegius
legalis quod dictus Wilellmus erit Indempnis pro dicto michaele aliter quam per viam Juris
Dauid Steuart deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis pro Johanne
broys' aliter quam per viam Juris michael baldevy deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
Willelmus erit Indempnis pro Waltero chamer aliter quam per viam Juris Johannes nydry
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis pro michaele Suenton' aliter
quam per viam Juris Et gilbertus menyes deuenit plegius legalis quod dicte persone
erunt Indempnes pro dicto Wilellmo aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictarum
parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huismodi fideiussione
per manuum suarum dexterarum ostendem

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirde tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die
Septembris anno quo supra

head.add: Androw logy and thomas towy quhitfischearis

div.p:
The saide day the ballieis chargit and ordanit Androu logy quhitfiscear
to Reman with thome towy his mastir and mak him seruice for hale ane yer'
immediate eftir the date of this court the tenor his his avne
gravnt

The saide day Comperit Jok of mar' ane of the Clerkis of
Abirdene with Alexander mar' and Johne of mar' his fadir and brothir and schew
how the tovne hede licencit him to pass to the sculis and that
the childe cristy Narne quhilk he diuisit to haue put in his
seruice was passit fra the Sangscule to the gramarscule and has maide
nay seruice in the queir' as yet he being within the tone for
him quharfor he presumis that he sal mak litill gude seruice for
him in his absence sene he falyeit in his presence that he entirit
Thome chamer to the aldirman and ballieis and substitut him vndir
him in his saide Office of clerkschip to mak gude seruice
and ministracion' in the samyn to his agane Cumin to the plesour
of gode and the tone Ande the saide thome sal gif termlie and yerlie
to the saide Alexander or johne the half of al profitis that he gettis of
the said' office be his avne aithe for the quhilkis sere Androu
chamer is becumin Souerte bath for his gude seruice and pament
Ande gif the saide thome happinnis to falye In the saide seruice
or pament of the half of the profitis of the saide clarkschip as said'
